sourcesContent:
import React,{useState} from 'react' import './Signup.css' import { Button } from '@material-ui/core'; import {userSignup, userLogin} from 'api' import {useHistory} from 'react-router' const SignUp = () => { const History = useHistory() const [userInfo, setUserInfo] = useState({ username: '', password: '', name: '', email: '' }) const {username, password, name, email} = userInfo const handleChange = e => { const { name, value } = e.target setUserInfo({ ...userInfo, [name]: value }) } const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() alert(`전송 클릭: ${JSON.stringify({...userInfo})}`) userSignup({...userInfo}) .then(res =>{alert(`회원가입 완료 : ${res.data.result}`)}) .catch(err => {alert(`회원가입 실패 : ${err}`)}) /*const loginRequest = {...userInfo} userLogin(loginRequest) .then() .catch()*/ } const handleClick = e => { e.preventDefault() alert('취소 클릭') } return (<>

Sign Up

Please fill in this form to create an account.

By creating an account you agree to our Terms & Privacy.

) } export default SignUp
